import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Review } from 'src/app/entities/review'; import { AppService } from 'src/app/services/appservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'add-review', templateUrl: './add-review.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-review.component.scss'] }) export class AddReviewComponent { constructor(private appService:AppService) { } model = new Review(1,"","",""); submitted = false; onSubmit() { alert('Hi I am here'); this.appService.savereview(this.model); this.submitted = true; } }

Add a Review
